channel.title: HUGO on Journey
channel.description: Recent content in HUGO on Journey

item.title: HUGO Setup
item.description: First blog, Learned a new thing This is my first Blog Very less things to explain, but I came to know about Hugo’s themes I assume that Hugo uses a lookup rules internally through themes to determine how a page should be built But this is cool I like this. Starting up. Well Setup for HUGO is as follows brew install hugo in terminal hugo new site 'site_name' creates a folder with the given site_name cd site_name/themes; select a theme for your site git clone {theme-repo} link from github, clones the theme repo.
